flavor: You are (or were) employed by a Forked Tongue trading post, perhaps as a local guide, as muscle for a major merchant house, or as an independent trader. Maybe you became involved in a feud between rival merchant houses, or perhaps your post was plundered by raiders. Were you a clerk, a mercenary, or a laborer? Do you still have contacts with the house that employed you?
name: Forked Tongue - Merchant~trader
